planet.name: Kepler-52 b
KOI 775.02
KID 11754553
planet.description: This planet candidate was discovered by the Kepler spacecraft. It transits its host star every 7.88 days for 2.4223 hours. Periodic transit timing variations confirm its planetary nature.
